Uses of Package
xxl.core.cursors.sources

Packages that use xxl.core.cursors.sources
xxl.core.cursors.sorters The package xxl.core.cursors.sorters provides miscellaneous implementations of sort operators on cursors. 
xxl.core.cursors.sources The package xxl.core.cursors.sources provides miscellaneous implementations of source operators. 
xxl.core.relational.cursors The package provides a whole algebra of cursors that extends the functionality of the classes cursors. 
 

Classes in xxl.core.cursors.sources used by xxl.core.cursors.sorters
DiscreteRandomNumber
          A cursor providing a finite or finite stream of randomly distributed integer values given by the wrapped pseudo random number generator DiscreteRandomWrapper for discrete numbers.
 

Classes in xxl.core.cursors.sources used by xxl.core.cursors.sources
EmptyCursor
          An empty cursor contains no elements, i.e., every call to its hasNext method will return false.
Inductor
          Given a tuple of start values (a0 to an) the inductor incrementally computes the value a(n+1+i) (i ≥ 0) by calling the function next with the parameters ai to a(n+i).
Repeater
          A repeater reiterates a given object n times.
 

Classes in xxl.core.cursors.sources used by xxl.core.relational.cursors
ContinuousRandomNumber
          A cursor providing a finite or infinite stream of randomly distributed double values given by the wrapped pseudo random number generator for continuous numbers.
